abstract: What place do animals hold in modern American culture? As a long-term photo project by Colleen Plumb makes clear, the animal kingdom - both real and manufactured - varies widely.
snippet: What place do animals hold in modern American culture? As a long-term photo project by Colleen Plumb makes clear, the animal kingdom - both real and manufactured - varies widely.
lead_paragraph: There is no single word that can define "Animals Are Outside Today," the photography book that Colleen Plumb has worked on for more than a decade.

headline.main: Love and Loss and the Animal Kingdom
